about_the_game:
This versatile set of materials is perfect for creating both modern and fantasy interiors!

Not only does it include general, easy-to-use tables and chairs, but it also offers extendable tables and counters. Plus, you'll find a wide range of furniture designs, from wall decorations to corner shelves. With tabletop items and lamps for walls and ceilings, you can furnish every corner of a room to your heart's content.

---------------------------------

Contents

◆Assets Files

2 tilesets (recommended for Tileset C~E)

◆Sample project

Includes 2 maps that utilize this tile set

Includes the 2 maps that used as the product title images

---------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

Plus, you'll find a wide range of furniture designs, from wall decorations to corner shelves. With tabletop items and lamps for walls and ceilings, you can furnish every corner of a room to your heart's content.
